name: Python Package Index
description: De-facto repository for any and all Python software packages, and a canonical source of package names.

SDGs.evidenceText: It hosts a lot of Python packages that are used in education processes.
There are packages used by scientists for economic studies.
Plenty of innovation and digital infrastructure is powered by Python packages distributed through PyPI
Python community is about people, and PyPI is a good example of an open community service
Models and packages shared through PyPI help researchers see through the data to find new solutions.
